content.question: Which of the following best expresses the significance of works of art such as Bisa Butler’s quilted portrait of Harriet Tubman?

choices.label: Contemporary African American artists seek to fill the gap left by the lack of visual representations of nineteenth-century Black leaders by trying to imagine how those leaders might have looked.
Contemporary African American artists embrace abstract, nonrepresentational, and symbolic ways to convey what the legacy of Black abolitionists means to them.
Contemporary African American artists combine Black aesthetic traditions with historical images to preserve and celebrate the historical legacy of African American leaders.
Contemporary African American artists use their art to address the struggles and discrimination that ordinary African American people continue to face in their daily lives today.

content.answer: Contemporary African American artists combine Black aesthetic traditions with historical images to preserve and celebrate the historical legacy of African American leaders.
